artist: Attributed to Palma il Giovane; Attributed to Marcantonio Bassetti
inscription:
Inscription and Stamp

LRC, in brown ink inside green stamp: [80]; LRC, in brown ink: [45 (?) 888]; on back of mount, in pencil: [416614 (344)]
life_date: Attributed to Palma il Giovane, Italian (Venice), 1544–1628; Attributed to Marcantonio Bassetti, Italian, 1586–1630
markings: LRC, stamped in red: [HL (inside heart)], Lugt 4052; see Inscription
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash over red chalk on laid paper laid down on blue paper
provenance: Henri Ledoux, Lugt 4052 (20th century), Paris. Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 2, 1984, no. 50, for £480, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1984-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Forge of Vulcan
